typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CSAL_FACT_SALES_SK as string,
		DIM_KUNDE_FK as string,
		DIM_AUFTRAG_FK as string,
		DIM_ORGA_FK as string,
		DIM_MATERIAL_FK as string,
		DIM_ZEIT_FK as string,

		CSAL_VBELN as string,
		CSAL_MATNR as string,
		CSAL_AUFNR as string,
		CSAL_KUNNR as string,
		CSAL_AWAHR as string,
		CSAL_BNAME as string,
		CSAL_VKORG as string,
		CSAL_VTWEG as string,

		CSAL_POSNR as string,

		CSAL_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CSAL_CREATED_ON as string,
		CSAL_SOURCE as string,
		CSAL_VALID_FROM as string,
		CSAL_VALID_TO as string,
		CSAL_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CSAL_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.FACT_SALES',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCore
sourceCore derive(CSAL_FACT_SALES_SK = 0,
		DIM_KUNDE_FK = 0,
		DIM_AUFTRAG_FK = 0,
		DIM_ORGA_FK = 0,
		DIM_MATERIAL_FK = 0,
		DIM_ZEIT_FK = 0,
		CSAL_MANDT = toInteger(CSAL_MANDT),
		CSAL_VBELN = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_MATNR = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_AUFNR = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_KUNNR = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_AWAHR = 000,
		CSAL_BNAME = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_VKORG = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_VTWEG = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_BUKRS_VF = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_POSNR = 00,
		CSAL_NETPR = toFloat(00),
		CSAL_WAERK = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_KWMENG = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_UMSATZ = toFloat(00),
		CSAL_BSTDK = 29991231,
		CSAL_HASHKEY_BK = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_HASHKEY_DATA = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_CREATED_ON = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CSAL_SOURCE = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_VALID_FROM = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CSAL_VALID_TO = toDate('29991231 00:00:00.0000000'),
		CSAL_CURRENT_FLAG = 'DUMMY',
		CSAL_DML_STRAT = 'DUMMY') ~> changeDatatype
changeDatatype select(mapColumn(
		CSAL_FACT_SALES_SK,
		DIM_KUNDE_FK,
		DIM_AUFTRAG_FK,
		DIM_ORGA_FK,
		DIM_MATERIAL_FK,
		DIM_ZEIT_FK,
		CSAL_MANDT,
		CSAL_VBELN,
		CSAL_MATNR,
		CSAL_AUFNR,
		CSAL_KUNNR,
		CSAL_AWAHR,
		CSAL_BNAME,
		CSAL_VKORG,
		CSAL_VTWEG,
		CSAL_BUKRS_VF,
		CSAL_POSNR,
		CSAL_NETPR,
		CSAL_WAERK,
		CSAL_KWMENG,
		CSAL_UMSATZ,
		CSAL_BSTDK,
		CSAL_HASHKEY_BK,
		CSAL_HASHKEY_DATA,

		CSAL_SOURCE,
		CSAL_VALID_FROM,
		CSAL_VALID_TO,
		CSAL_CURRENT_FLAG,
		CSAL_DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrderCol
OrderCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CORE.FACT_SALES'],
	postSQLs:['INSERT INTO [CORE].[FACT_SALES]\n           ([CSAL_FACT_SALES_SK]\n           ,[DIM_KUNDE_FK]\n           ,[DIM_AUFTRAG_FK]\n           ,[DIM_ORGA_FK]\n           ,[DIM_MATERIAL_FK]\n           ,[DIM_ZEIT_FK]\n           ,[CSAL_MANDT]\n           ,[CSAL_VBELN]\n           ,[CSAL_MATNR]\n           ,[CSAL_AUFNR]\n           ,[CSAL_KUNNR]\n           ,[CSAL_AWAHR]\n           ,[CSAL_BNAME]\n           ,[CSAL_VKORG]\n           ,[CSAL_VTWEG]\n           ,[CSAL_BUKRS_VF]\n           ,[CSAL_POSNR]\n           ,[CSAL_NETPR]\n           ,[CSAL_WAERK]\n           ,[CSAL_KWMENG]\n           ,[CSAL_UMSATZ]\n           ,[CSAL_BSTDK]\n           ,[CSAL_HASHKEY_BK]\n           ,[CSAL_HASHKEY_DATA]\n           ,[CSAL_CREATED_ON]\n           ,[CSAL_SOURCE]\n           ,[CSAL_VALID_FROM]\n           ,[CSAL_VALID_TO]\n           ,[CSAL_CURRENT_FLAG]\n           ,[CSAL_DML_STRAT])\n     VALUES\n           (0\n           ,0\n           ,0\n           ,0\n           ,0\n           ,0\n           ,999\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,0000\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,000\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,0000\n           ,00\n           ,0000\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,0000\n           ,0000\n           ,29991231\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'29991231 00:00:00.0000000\'\n           ,\'Y\'\n           ,\'DUMMY\')'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> coreDummy
